### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    lead_email TEXT NOT NULL,
    lead_score INT DEFAULT 0
)

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name TEXT NOT NULL,

)
